sentences: Steve Roche (Stephen) (born 1964) is a New Zealand composer and performer.
Steve Roche and David Donaldson and Janet Roddick have been part of the eclectic Wellington music scene for over twenty-five years.
They first collaborated as members of the electric 1980s band Six Volts and continued with the Brainchilds.

In 2006, they produced their third album, Witâ€™s end which is a collection of lo-fi, experimental pop music which ranges from a take on a Len Lye vocal sample All You've Got Someday to a Janet Roddick composition Sea of Tranquility.
